reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Contributo all'UNDP per il Programma multi-donatori Stabilization Facility for Libya - SFL

description.narrative: Il nuovo obiettivo della SFL è volto a "Rafforzare le autorità statali legittime e riconosciute a livello internazionale e promuovere l'unità nazionale per tutti i libici" tramite una riduzione dei conflitti locali e l'aumento della stabilità.

The SFL is an immediate stabilization initiative with the goal to "Strengthen the legitimate and internationally recognized state authorities and foster national unity for all Libyans". The SFL aims to reinforce local peace deals to make them more resilient and inclusive, mediating local conflicts and promoting a culture of peaceful resolution of conflicts to counter the violent trend. The SFL therefore supports state authorities to build public trust among the Libyan population through providing quick rehabilitation of local critical infrastructure, to support local stabilisation goals, and through enhancing the capability of local authorities in taking a more active role in stabilisation and peacebuilding.
